name: NIGHTMARE While FEVER!.
description:
In this game you have to explore all the places in this game! =Game Story= You wake up in your room in the middle of the night, you decide to check all the rooms to make sure nothing is wrong, but suddenly you feel something... =Note= I made this game because I often have nightmares when I sleep, I don't know why, but because of that, I took the initiative to make a game about being a nightmare :) Sorry NMWF on Mac OS X & Linux are bugged, so i delete Mac OS X & Linux Versions =( =Control=
  • WASD : Move
  • Shift : Sneak
  • Mouse : Look
=Minimum System Requirements=
  • CPU 2,30 GHZ or Higher
  • 2 / 4 GB Ram or Higher
  • GPU AMD Radeon R3 Graphics or Upper
  • 150 MB Disk Space 
!Download NOW! !Available For Windows!
